entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'Harry Potter' in the first line.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who is with Harry and Hermione, described as 'bent double, wheezing and spluttering'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person who is with Harry and Neville, described as 'clutching at the stitch in her chest'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: A person who is with Harry and Hermione, mentioned as saying 'We've got to get back to Gryffindor Tower'.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A person who tricked Harry, mentioned as having tipped off Filch.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A person who was informed by Malfoy, mentioned as knowing someone would be in the trophy room.

relationships.description: Harry and Neville are together, described as 'They ripped through a tapestry and found themselves in a hidden passageway...'
Harry and Hermione are together, described as 'They hadn't gone more than a dozen paces when a doorknob rattled...'
Malfoy tricked Harry, described as 'Malfoy tricked you,' Hermione said to Harry.
Hermione told Harry that Malfoy tricked him, described as 'I – told – you,' Hermione gasped.
Ron said they had to get back to Gryffindor Tower, described as 'We've got to get back to Gryffindor Tower'.
